thread.title: Hero dog Harley trades life of abuse for applause
thread.title_full: Hero dog Harley trades life of abuse for applause

title: Hero dog Harley trades life of abuse for applause
text: > Entertainment Hero dog Harley trades life of abuse for applause This undated photo provided by Chris Church-DiCiccio shows Chara, an 8-year-old Norwegian wolfhound who lives with handler Kristina Church-DiCiccio in Waynesboro, Va. In 2008, Church-DiCiccio developed a neurological condition. She and Chara worked out a way for her to recognize attacks. Two weeks after Church-DiCiccioâ€™s son was born, Chara used her alerting skill to let her know her boy had stopped breathing.(Chris Church-DiCiccio via AP)
